name: Central City Panic
description:
PS: It is possible to play in the browser, but it is highly recommended to download and play on the desktop version.

Alien invaders are arriving in Central City. Protect it using different types of ships and destroying thousands of enemy troops. You are humanity's last hope, so be brave!

This game was made between Feb 4 - Feb 8, 2021 for NOKIA 3310 JAM 3. This jam imposes severe resolution, sound, and color restrictions on its entries, requiring all games to be 84x48 and use only two specific colors.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to MOVE.
  • X to SHOOT.
  • You can press DELETE on the title screen to delete the high score.

Credits:
Code by Luis Felipe Patrocinio.
Music by Bruno Piazza.
Sound effects by Trix, and Font by Gismo199, from the game jam resources.
Engine : GameMaker Studio 2.
